DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective determine efficacy safety GITS formulation Doxazosin Taiwanese patient prostate enlargement .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Of The Efficacy And Safety Of The Doxasozin Gastrointestinal Therapeutic System ( GITS ) In Patients With Prostate Enlargement
DOC.criteria: Taiwanese male subject 50 80 year age : primary diagnosis BPH , define enlarge prostate ( confirmed digital rectal examination [ DRE ] and/or Bmode ultrasound ) ; IPSS score ≥12 ; Qmax range 5 15 mL/sec total void volume ≥150 mL , eligible study . Exclusion criterion include limit : Previous prostate surgery , presence prostate stent microwave thermotherapy and/or balloon dilatation within previous 6 month Concomitant therapy previous therapy within 14 day agent know affect bladder urethral function .
